title: Warmth for Kurigram
description: Help provide winter clothing to the most vulnerable families in Kurigram.

title: Blanket Drive in Dhaka
description: Distributing blankets to the homeless and low-income families in Dhaka city.

title: Sylhet Winter Aid
description: Support rural communities in Sylhet with warm clothing for the winter.

title: Chattogram Warm Clothes Campaign
description: Bring warmth to vulnerable children and elderly in Chattogram during winter.

title: Rajshahi Blanket Distribution
description: Providing winter blankets to families in need in Rajshahi's rural areas.

title: Khulna Cold Relief Project
description: Helping fishermen and their families stay warm during the cold season in Khulna.

title: Mymensingh Winter Drive
description: Donating sweaters and jackets to rural schools in Mymensingh.

title: Barishal Warmth Campaign
description: Supporting low-income families in Barishal with coats and blankets.

title: Winter Relief in Dinajpur
description: Providing essential winter supplies to the underserved communities in Dinajpur.

title: Patuakhali Winter Aid
description: Helping coastal communities in Patuakhali stay warm during the harsh winter.
